ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: I live, die and slay on prexus.  I do seek the unknown, for I am a wanderer.  But most of my kill are in the FOB, for I despise the Pandas. Batleth I kill them
ygData.messageBody:
I live, die and slay on prexus.  I do seek the unknown, for I am a wanderer.  But most of my kill are in the FOB, for I despise the Pandas.
 
Batleth
I kill them because they are alive.
 
----
 
I'm a newbie, Batleth is my first (and only) character.   Actually my second, my first ISK was a female and when I found out (lvl 5) I deleted her and started over.  Hey, female Iksars don't have breasts. 
 
Any hunting tips and weapon choices are welcomed.  I mostly solo.  The reading out there is so controversial.  And very little is on ISK's.

Bat'leth
